item.title: Aniki Remake 2.1.5 – New Stats View
item.description: New layout for the Stats view, better readability and a more "console UI" feeling.

item.title: New: Aniki News hub
item.description: Introducing the new "Aniki News" view: RSS feed, latest Steam updates, and global news – all in one place.
